# Graphical Results

```{r}
#| label: update targets metadata
tar_meta_download()
```

```{r}
print(plot)
```

# Comments
The date and hash of the current model run is:
```{r target-hash}
stri_c(
  c(
    as.character(
      as.Date(
        tar_meta(mcmc_mcmc_hirt.hom, "time")[[2]]
      )
    ),
    tar_meta(mcmc_mcmc_hirt.hom, "data")[[2]]
  ),
  collapse = "-"
)
```
